name: Particle on a Mobius Strip (PMS) The Video Game
name_original: Particle on a Mobius Strip (PMS) The Video Game
description:
This is a point-and-click video game designed to teach the player about quantum mechanics: specifically, how fermions spin with the particle on a Mobius Strip concept.
